metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000051 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Artifex Mupdf version 1.12.0 contains a Use After Free vulnerability infz_keep_key_storable that can result in DOS / Possible code execution. Thisattack appear to be exploitable via Victim opens a specially crafted PDF.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
